description_localized.en:
Our gourmet cuisine  transforms  regular ingredients into culinary masterpieces. Come and experience the craft that turns the simple act of eating into fine Art of Dining.

The Atrium restaurant houses variety of theme  nights from Western to Eastern specialties.

Equally fascinating is the Bollywood Lounge and Restaurant that introduces exquisite Indian cuisines combined with a unique dining concept. While enjoying your meal, your eyes will capture famous Indian movies, celebrities and snapshots of the Indian culture.

Grab a light meal or enjoy a sumptuous afternoon tea at our Lobby Lounge. The free Wifi internet encourages you to work, enjoy, connect and relax in the warmth of the hotel lobby.
